sentences.sentence: If the digests are the same, then the message was not tampered with en route.
sentences.translation: 如果这两个摘要是相同的，则消息在途中未被篡改。

sentences.sentence: One Twitter group is offering its followers single-sentence-long "digests" of the great novels.
sentences.translation: 一个 Twitter 团体正在向其追随者提供伟大小说的单句“摘要”。
